sentences.sContent: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.
sentences.sCn: 小心地切开海绵蛋糕圈，然后在两半中间夹上生奶油。

synos.tran: 夹入；挤进；把...[食品]做成三明治

phrases.pCn: 夹层结构；三明治结构；叠层构造
夹层板；多层板；多层垫板
乳酪三明治；之士三文治
三明治世代（同时扶养与照顾父母和子女的人）
n. 挂在身上的广告牌
夹层梁；层结梁；多层叠合梁
三明治群岛（夏威夷群岛的旧称）

trans.tranCn: 夹入；挤进；把做成三明治
trans.tranOther: If you sandwich two things together with something else, you put that other thing between them. If you sandwich one thing between two other things, you put it between them.
two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them
